channel.title: Pandas on Mozart's Sheet
channel.description: Recent content in Pandas on Mozart's Sheet

item.title: Write Mumultiple Dataframes to Worksheets
item.description:
In normal work, I usually use Pandas as my excel read/write utility.

Here is an example for how to write multiple dataframes to worksheets. We need to use pd.ExcelWriter method.

item.title: 卡方检验 - 检验特征对是否相关
item.description: 在本文开头，贴一段百科对卡方检验基本原理的介绍： 卡方检验就是统计样本的实际观测值与理论推断值之间的偏离程度，实际观测值与理论推断值之间的偏离
